name: The Deep and Forever; or the Joy of Falling Upward
name_original: The Deep and Forever; or the Joy of Falling Upward
description: Welcome to The Deep and Forever; or the Joy of Falling Upward. This game is intended to be an exploration of the self, and should take 5 to 10 minutes to complete. This game was written as an entry to the Entity Jam, and is based off the avatar of the Vast. If you experience vertigo or have a fear of heights, please exercise caution when reading through this game.
